mapper.delete: delete from user_favorite where user_id = #{userID} and favorite_id = #{favoriteID}; delete from favorite_collection where favorite_id = #{favoriteID};
mapper.select: select f.id, f.name, f.annotation, f.if_private, c.id as collection_id, c.title, c.href, c.synopsis, u.nickname, u.username from favorite_collection fc join (favorite f , user_favorite uf, `user` u) on fc.favorite_id = f.id and f.id = uf.favorite_id and uf.user_id = u.id left join collection c on fc.collection_id = c.id

select f.id, f.name, f.annotation, f.if_private, c.id as collection_id, c.title, c.href, c.synopsis, u.nickname, u.username from user_favorite uf join (`user` u, favorite f) on uf.user_id = u.id and uf.favorite_id = f.id left join favorite_collection fc on fc.favorite_id = f.id left join collection c on fc.collection_id = c.id where u.username = #{username}
select c.id, c.title, c.href, c.synopsis from favorite_collection fc join collection c on fc.collection_id = c.id where fc.favorite_id = #{favoriteID} and c.href = #{href}
select f.id, f.name, f.annotation, f.if_private from user_favorite uf join (favorite f , `user` u ) on uf.favorite_id = f.id and uf.user_id = u.id where u.username = #{username}
